title: Michael

## Useful info

**Michael** is a weak unique. In [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), he was removed from the game.

Spells: [Throw Frost](/Throw_Frost "Throw Frost"), [Throw Flame](/Throw_Flame "Throw Flame"), [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart"), [Haste](/Haste "Haste"), and [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")

## Tips and tricks

R.I.P Michael
